programme.title: Shahs of Sunset
programme.desc: The Shahs attempt to return to normal life and prepare for baby Elijah's welcome party; Nema struggles with not being invited; Reza is doing damage control after leaving GG and Destiney behind in Palm Springs.

programme.title: Shahs of Sunset
programme.desc: Destiney's Halloween party might be more trick than treat; GG helps MJ realize that Reza needs uplifting, leading to an emotional meeting between the lifelong friends; Destiney finds herself sinking deeper into Mike's relationship drama.

programme.title: Shahs of Sunset
programme.desc: Still reeling from the horrors of Halloween, Mike and Destiney lean on their friends for support; Nema and Shervin treat Mike to a guys' night out; GG questions Destiney's loyalty to Paulina; Reza takes an emotional trip down memory lane.

programme.title: Shahs of Sunset
programme.desc: With help from London, Nema reaches out to Golnesa to offer an apology, and Mike meets up with Reza hoping to find peace; the group gathers for Friendsgiving dinner, but the good vibes disappear after they question Paulina's absence.

programme.title: Shahs of Sunset
programme.sub-title: A Friend in Need is a Friend Indeed
programme.desc: GG confronts Mike over her concerns about Paulina's shifting loyalties; MJ discusses struggles in her marriage; Reza turns his focus onto his book, and interviews his mom; London aids Nema in his quest for a love connection.

programme.title: Shahs of Sunset
programme.sub-title: To Ahloo or not to Ahloo
programme.desc: The Shahs look to move forward as Mike's building project nears completion and Destiny says "Ahloo" to a new clothing and accessories line; facing intimacy challenges in her marriage, MJ looks to spice things up.

programme.title: Shahs of Sunset
programme.desc: Tired of the conflict within the group, GG takes her friends on a nature healing trip; on an RV drive to their Redwoods getaway, lingering tensions between Reza and Mike arise, with newcomer London becoming collateral damage.

programme.title: Shahs of Sunset
programme.sub-title: The Good, the Bad and the Shahsy
programme.desc: The crew kicks off the first day of their Redwoods trip with adventure, bonding and libations; Mike and MJ overcome fears in the tree-tops, while Reza's group enjoys the vineyard and questions Paulina's whereabouts.

programme.title: Shahs of Sunset
programme.desc: MJ and Destiney share a moment acknowledging their growth, while Reza struggles with news about Tommy; GG organizes a Wusah-inspired, spirit animal-themed dinner for the final night, but the tranquility only lasts so long.

programme.title: Shahs of Sunset
programme.desc: Mike looks for redemption from his recent scandal but hits a roadblock when Destiney claims there is more to the story; Mercedes opens up about feeling left out when Reza gives all of his attention to Golnesa and Destiney.

programme.title: Shahs of Sunset
programme.desc: Paulina tries to take ownership of the drama she caused amongst the friends; Reza drops a bomb that no one saw coming; Golnesa questions whether she and Mercedes might ever be friends again, while Mercedes and Reza have a heart-to-heart.

programme.desc: Asa is an outcast with her unique wardrobe; MJ shows bitterness towards marriage; GG seems to be jealous of Mike's date.

programme.desc: GG and MJ's gossiping with Anita causes tempers to flair and threaten Reza's 38th birthday party in Las Vegas.

programme.desc: Mohamed comes back from vacation and evaluated Sammy's work; Asa feels pressure with her image; MJ shows up late for GG's parents 40th anniversary.
